description: Vegan maple pecan cookies, made gluten-free with Bob's Red Mill 1:1 Flour and packed with aromatic maple, pecan, and toasted oat flavor. The perfect cookie that everyone at your holiday table can enjoy!
name: Vegan Maple Pecan Cookies (Gluten-free)
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup + 2 tablespoons Bob's Red Mill Gluten Free 1-to-1 Baking Flour (124g)
2 tbsp coconut oil (31g) warm or room temperature)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the maple syrup, coconut oil, pecans, and salt to a pan. Turn the heat to medium-low and cook the pecans, stirring frequently but not constantly, until the maple syrup is thickened onto the pecans, about 5 to 7 minutes.
Immediately remove the candied pecans from the pan and transfer them to a plate or bowl to cool. Once cool enough to handle, roughly chop the candied pecans and set aside.
